pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Optimization Infrastructure: 'MIPLIB' 2010 Benchmark Instances // The mixed integer programming library 'MIPLIB' (see http://miplib.zib.de/) is commonly used to compare the performance of mixed integer optimization solvers. This package provides functions to access 'MIPLIB' from the 'R' Optimization Infrastructure ('ROI'). More information about 'MIPLIB' can be found in the paper by Koch et al. available at http://mpc.zib.de/index.php/MPC/article/viewFile/56/28. The 'README.md' file illustrates how to use this package.
